text: Marie-Chantal de Grèce (born Marie-Chantal Claire Miller, 17 September 1968) is an American socialite and designer. In 1995, she married Pavlos de Grèce, a Greek-British socialite and investment banker. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Royalty from London Category:Greek princes and princesses Category:Exiled royalty
title: Marie-Chantal, Crown Princess of Greece
